text: 14.26: FG 13.1-3; 15.40Mani Atarian vergap, maam kema ndigap, vov Antiokan vugi. Mba Antiokan kav Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi mbe fhum, Por gum Barnabas ndim Fhe Bakɨme farve ga suav ana phorga nzuav khaŋ suaŋgi, “O, Fhe Bakɨme, ndu kha gumani korar muuŋgirim, mani kha ŋaarar muunga.” Mbe mani ga nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga suaŋgim, mani vov, mba ŋaara muuŋgiap, mani ntige taagia vov, mba Antiokan vugi.
